panels.title: Container cpu system seconds total per node

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (container_cpu_system_seconds_total{container_name="$pod", pod_name=~"$pod-.+", cpu="", instance=~"$node", env="$env"})

panels.title: Container cpu system seconds total per node
Average 5m rate of container cpu system seconds total per node
Container fs usage summary per node
Average 5m rate of containers fs current  usage for $pod
Average 5m rate of containers fs io current for $pod
Average 5m rate of containers memory cache for $pod

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (container_memory_failures_total{container_name="$pod", pod_name=~"$pod.+", type="pgfault", scope="hierarchy", instance=~"$node", env="$env"})

panels.title: Cumulative count of memory allocation failures for $pod

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (rate(container_memory_failures_total{container_name="$pod", pod_name=~"$pod.+", type="pgfault", scope="container",  instance=~"$node", env="$env"}[5m]))

panels.title: Average 5m rate of cumulative count of memory allocation failures for $pod

Average 5m rate of  containers network packets total per node
Average 5m rate of containers network errors total per node
Average 5m rate of containers network dropped packets total per node
